name: Jungle Zuma - Bubble Shooter
description:
Jungle Zuma - Casual Game is a marble bubble shooter game with the theme of Egyptian mythology.

This game is different with other marble bubble shooter game.it's contain some different level types;It's more fun.
In time mode you should reach to the target score to pass the level.Others you should clear all the ball include stone ball,ice ball,bird ball and so on.If you like zuma game,you should try this zumiez game.

Jungle Zuma - Casual Game Features:
- Good art,good music,good animation effects.
- Many elements make game more fun like ice ball、stone ball、bird ball etc.
- Cool powerfull items like bombs、wind、meteorite rain、hammer.
- 500 different fun levels,more will coming soon.
- Finish all levels with 3 stars.

How to play:
1.Tap screen where you want to shoot marbles.
2.match 3 or more same color marbles to make blast.
3.Swap the shooting ball by touching the emitter.

Download Jungle Zuma - Casual Zuma Now!!
Enjoy this Jungle zumiez journey!!!
